participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Caring and responsible, enjoys helping others and has a strong sense of community.
participant_1.background: I work full-time in a shipyard. I donate a part of my salary to charity each month. I volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. My favorite color is navy blue.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Lively and eager for independence, enjoys socializing with friends and is determined to make the most of life.
participant_2.background: I'm 19 and I cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. I have a part-time job at Burger King. I don't drink or do drugs; I just want to have fun with my friends.

content.text: Hi there, I'm fine! i'm 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. How old are you?
just got done working at our family travel business   do you travel
No i work took i've a part time job at burger king. Have you ever been to burger king?
no i work part time in burger king and it sucks
its alright   i don t like my parents and their divorce tho
I love my parents but they're constantly on my back.
i give them away i learned in during my time üïê in foster care
i do not drink or do drugs or anything. do you do drugs?
most of the people üë≠ in my family i do not really like at all
no   i do not care for animals unless i am eating them
i donate to locks of love üíè if that counts
i just want to have fun with my friends. you can join us! it's free, just pay 15 bucks to us and then count to ten with your eyes closed
i might consider having kids of my own when i finish grad school üö∏ next year
